title: Make and save changes to a documentation topic
contents:
mode_edit

對文件主題進行更改並儲存link

Make and save changes to a documentation topiclink

本主題介紹你在更改文件時要執行的任務。

This topic describes tasks that you perform while making changes to the documentation.

重要提示：
只有在執行了為編輯建立工作分支 中所講的操作後，才能執行這些任務。

IMPORTANT:
Only perform these tasks after you have created a working branch in which to work as described in Create a working branch for editing.

在正確的工作分支中工作link

Work in the correct working branchlink

在更改任何檔案之前，請確保你正在正確的工作分支中工作。

Before you change any files, make sure that you are working in the correct working branch.

設定正確的工作分支進行編輯link

To set the correct working branch for editinglink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 執行此命令以檢查你的工作分支。將 working-branch 替換為你為文件問題建立的分支名稱。

    Run this command to check out your working branch. Replace working-branch with the name of the branch that you created for the documentation issue.

    git checkout working-branch

編輯文件link

Edit the documentationlink

在開始編輯之前，請檢視Angular 文件風格指南，以瞭解如何編寫文件中的文字並設定其格式。

Review the Angular documentation style guide before you start editing to understand how to write and format the text in the documentation.

在你的工作分支中，編輯需要更改的檔案。大多數文件原始檔都可以在 angular 儲存庫的 aio/content/guide 目錄中找到。

In your working branch, edit the files that need to be changed. Most documentation source files are found in the aio/content/guide directory of the angular repo.

Angular 開發工具可以在你進行更改時渲染文件。

Angular development tools can render the documentation as you make your changes.

在編輯時檢視渲染的文件link

To view the rendered documentation while you are editinglink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的終端窗格中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer or in the terminal pane of your IDE.

  1. 導航到你的工作目錄。

    Navigate to your working directory.

  2. 從你的工作目錄，執行此命令以導航到 aio 目錄。aio 目錄包含 Angular 的文件檔案和工具。

    From your working directory, run this command to navigate to the aio directory. The aio directory contains Angular's documentation files and tools.

    cd aio

  3. 執行此命令以在本地建構文件。

    Run this command to build the documentation locally.

    yarn build

    這會從頭開始建構文件，但不提供它。

    This builds the documentation from scratch, but does not serve it.

  4. 執行此命令以提供和同步文件。

    Run this command to serve and sync the documentation.

    yarn start

    這會在本地為你的 angular.io 網站草稿提供 http://localhost:4200，並監視對文件檔案的更改。每次你將更新儲存到文件檔案時，位於 http://localhost:4200 的 angular.io 網站都會更新。儲存後，你可能需要重新整理瀏覽器以檢視更改。

    This serves your draft of the angular.io website locally at http://localhost:4200 and watches for changes to documentation files. Each time you save an update to a documentation file, the angular.io website at http://localhost:4200 is updated. You might need to refresh your browser to see the changes after you save them.

文件 lintinglink

Documentation lintinglink

如果你在本地計算機和 IDE 上安裝了 Vale，每次你儲存 Markdown 檔案時，Vale 都會檢查它的常見錯誤。文件 linter Vale 會報告它在 Visual Studio Code 的“問題”窗格中發現的錯誤。這些錯誤也會反映在文件原始碼中，儘可能接近問題。

If you installed Vale on your local computer and your IDE, each time you save a markdown file, Vale reviews it for common errors. Vale, the documentation linter, reports the errors it finds in the Problems pane of Visual Studio Code. The errors are also reflected in the documentation source code, as close to the problem as possible.

有關文件 linting 和解決 lint 問題的更多資訊，請參閱解決文件 linter 訊息。

For more information about documentation linting and resolving lint problems, see Resolve documentation linter messages.

儲存你的更改link

Save your changeslink

當你對本地計算機上的文件原始檔進行更改時，你的更改可以處於這些狀態之一。

As you make changes to the documentation source files on your local computer, your changes can be in one of these states.

  • 已建立，但未儲存

    Made, but not saved

    這是你在整合開發環境（IDE）中編輯檔案時所做的更改的狀態。

    This is the state of your changes as you edit a file in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 已儲存，但未提交

    Saved, but not committed

    從 IDE 儲存對檔案的更改後，它們會儲存到你的本地計算機。雖然更改已儲存，但它們並沒有被版本控制軟體 git 記錄為更改。當你檢視正在進行的工作時，你的檔案通常處於此狀態。

    After you save changes to a file from the IDE, they are saved to your local computer. While the changes have been saved, they have not been recorded as a change by git, the version control software. Your files are typically in this state as you review your work in progress.

  • 已提交，但未推送

    Committed, but not pushed

    將更改提交到 git 後，你的更改會記錄為本地計算機上的提交，但它們不會儲存在雲端。這是你取得一些進展並且你希望將該進度儲存為提交時的檔案狀態。

    After you commit your changes to git, your changes are recorded as a commit on your local computer, but they are not saved in the cloud. This is the state of your files when you've made some progress and you want to save that progress as a commit.

  • 承諾並推動

    Committed and pushed

    在你將提交推送到 github.com 中的個人儲存庫後，你的更改會由 git 記錄並儲存到雲端。它們還不是 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分。這是你的檔案必須處於的狀態，然後你可以開啟 Pull Request 以使它們成為 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分。

    After you push your commits to your personal repo in github.com, your changes are recorded by git and saved to the cloud. They are not yet part of the angular/angular repo. This is the state your files must be in before you can open a pull request for them to become part of the angular/angular repo.

  • 合併到 Angular

    Merged into Angular

    在你的 Pull Request 被批准併合並後，你所做的更改現在是 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分，並出現在angular.io網站中。你的文件更新已完成。

    After your pull request is approved and merged, the changes you made are now part of the angular/angular repo and appear in the angular.io web site. Your documentation update is complete.

本節介紹如何儲存對工作目錄中的檔案所做的更改。如果你是使用 git 和 GitHub 的新手，請仔細檢視本節，以瞭解如何在進行更改時儲存更改。

This section describes how to save the changes you make to files in your working directory. If you are new to using git and GitHub, review this section carefully to understand how to save your changes as you make them.

將更改儲存到本地計算機link

Save your changes to your local computerlink

如何儲存你對本地計算機上的檔案所做的更改由你的 IDE 確定。有關儲存更改的具體過程，請參閱你的 IDE。此過程會儲存你的更改，但未提交。

How to save changes that you make to a file on your local computer is determined by your IDE. Refer to your IDE for the specific procedure of saving changes. This process makes your changes saved, but not committed.

檢視你渲染的主題link

Review your rendered topicslink

儲存對文件主題的更改之後，在本地計算機上提交這些更改之前，請在瀏覽器中檢視渲染的主題。

After you save changes to a documentation topic, and before you commit those changes on your local computer, review the rendered topic in a browser.

在本地計算機的瀏覽器中渲染你的更改link

To render your changes in a browser on your local computerlink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的終端窗格中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer or in the terminal pane of your IDE.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到工作目錄中的 aio 目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to the aio directory in your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    <code-example language="shell"> cd personal/angular/aio </code-example>

  2. 執行此命令以使用本地計算機上的檔案建構文件。

    Run this command to build the documentation using the files on your local computer.

    yarn build

    此命令從頭開始建構文件，但不提供檢視。

    This command builds the documentation from scratch, but does not serve it for viewing.

  3. 執行此命令以在本地提供文件，並在其更改後重建它。

    Run this command to serve the documentation locally and rebuild it after it changes.

    yarn start

    此命令在http://localhost:4200提供 Angular 文件。更新文件後，你可能需要重新整理瀏覽器以檢視瀏覽器中的更改。

    This command serves the Angular documentation at http://localhost:4200. You might need to refresh the browser after the documentation is updated to see the changes in your browser.

對更改感到滿意後，請在本地計算機上提交它們。

After you are satisfied with the changes, commit them on your local computer.

在本地計算機上提交你的更改link

Commit your changes on your local computerlink

在本地計算機上儲存更改並準備好在本地計算機上提交更改後，執行此過程。

Perform this procedure after you save the changes on your local computer and you are ready to commit changes on your local computer.

在本地計算機上提交你的更改link

To commit your changes on your local computerlink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的終端窗格中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer or in the terminal pane of your IDE.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到工作目錄中的 aio 目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to the aio directory in your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular/aio

  2. 執行此命令以確認你已準備好提交更改。

    Run this command to confirm that you are ready to commit your changes.

    git status

    git status 命令會返回這樣的輸出。

    The git status command returns an output like this.

    On branch working-branch Your branch is up to date with 'origin/working-branch Changes not staged for commit: (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed) (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory) modified: content/guide/doc-build-test.md modified: content/guide/doc-edit-finish.md modified: content/guide/doc-editing.md modified: content/guide/doc-pr-prep.md modified: content/guide/doc-pr-update.md modified: content/guide/doc-prepare-to-edit.md modified: content/guide/doc-select-issue.md modified: content/guide/doc-update-start.md no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

    1. 確認你在正確的工作分支中。

      Confirm that you in the correct working branch.

      如果你不在正確的分支中，請將 working-branch 替換為你的工作分支的名稱，然後執行 git checkout working-branch 以選擇正確的分支。

      If you are not in the correct branch, replace working-branch with the name of your working branch and then run git checkout working-branch to select the correct branch.

    2. 檢視列表中修改後的檔案。確認它們是你已更改並儲存但尚未提交的那些。已修改檔案的列表因你編輯的內容而異。

      Review the modified files in the list. Confirm that they are those that you have changed and saved, but not committed. The list of modified files varies, depending on what you have edited.

  3. 執行此命令以新增要提交的檔案。將 filename 替換為 git status 輸出中的檔名。

    Run this command to add a file that you want to commit. Replace filename with a filename from the git status output.

    git add filename

    你可以透過在 filename 引數中使用萬用字元來在單個命令中新增多個檔案。如此範例所示，你還可以執行此命令，以使用 * filename 將 git 追蹤的所有更改檔案新增到提交中。

    You can add multiple files in a single command by using wildcard characters in the filename parameter. You can also run this command to add all changed files that are being tracked by git to the commit by using * filename as this example shows.

    git add *

    重要提示：
    未被 git 追蹤的檔案不會提交或推送到你在 github.com 上的原始碼庫中，也不會出現在你的 Pull Request 中。

    IMPORTANT:
    Files that are not tracked by git are not committed or pushed to your repo on github.com and they do not appear in your pull request.

  4. 再次執行 git status。

    Run git status again.

    git status

  5. 檢視輸出並確認已準備好提交的檔案。

    Review the output and confirm the files that are ready to be committed.

    On branch working-branch Your branch is up to date with 'origin/working-branch'. Changes to be committed: (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage) modified: content/guide/doc-build-test.md modified: content/guide/doc-edit-finish.md modified: content/guide/doc-editing.md modified: content/guide/doc-pr-prep.md modified: content/guide/doc-pr-update.md modified: content/guide/doc-prepare-to-edit.md modified: content/guide/doc-select-issue.md modified: content/guide/doc-update-start.md

  6. 執行此命令以將更改的檔案提交到你的本地計算機。-m 引數後面的提交訊息必須以 docs: 開頭，後跟空格和你的訊息。將 detailed commit message 替換為描述你所做更改的訊息。

    Run this command to commit the changed files to your local computer. The commit message that follows the -m parameter must start with docs: followed by space, and your message. Replace detailed commit message with a message that describes the changes you made.

    git commit -m 'docs: detailed commit message'

    有關 Angular 提交訊息的更多資訊，請參閱格式化 Pull Request 的提交訊息。

    For more information about Angular commit messages, see Formatting commit messages for a pull request.

你對文件的更改現在已提交，但沒有 push。

Your changes to the documentation are now committed, but not pushed.

將你的提交推送到雲端link

Push your commits to the cloudlink

在你將更改提交到本地計算機後，此過程會將這些提交推送到你在雲中的 origin 儲存庫。

After you commit the changes to your local computer, this procedure pushes those commits to your origin repo in the cloud.

將你的更改推送到雲中的原始儲存庫link

To push your changes to your origin repo in the cloudlink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具或 IDE 的終端窗格中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer or in the terminal pane of your IDE.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到工作目錄中的 aio 目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to the aio directory in your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular/aio

  2. 執行此命令以確認你使用了正確的分支。

    Run this command to confirm that you are using the correct branch.

    git status

    如果你不在正確的分支中，請將 working-branch 替換為你的工作分支的名稱，並執行 git checkout working-branch 以選擇正確的分支。

    If you aren't in the correct branch, replace working-branch with the name of your working branch and run git checkout working-branch to select the correct branch.

    Git 狀態還會顯示你在本地計算機上是否有尚未推送到雲端的更改。

    Git status also shows whether you have changes on your local computer that have not been pushed to the cloud.

    On branch working-branch Your branch is ahead of 'origin/working-branch' by 1 commit. (use "git push" to publish your local commits)

    此範例輸出說，本地計算機上有一個提交不在 origin 儲存庫的 working-branch 分支中。origin 是 GitHub 中的 personal/angular 儲存庫。下一個命令將該提交推送到 origin 儲存庫。

    This example output says that there is one commit on the local computer that's not in the working-branch branch on the origin repo. The origin is the personal/angular repo in GitHub. The next command pushes that commit to the origin repo.

  3. 執行此命令，將本地計算機上的提交推送到你在雲 GitHub 上的帳戶。

    Run this command to push the commits on your local computer to your account on GitHub in the cloud.

    git push

    如果這是你第一次從分支推送提交，你可以看到如下訊息。

    If this is the first time you've pushed commits from the branch, you can see a message such as this.

    fatal: The current branch working-branch has no upstream branch. To push the current branch and set the remote as upstream, use git push --set-upstream origin working-branch To have this happen automatically for branches without a tracking upstream, see 'push.autoSetupRemote' in 'git help config'.

    如果你收到此訊息，請複製訊息提供的命令並執行它，如下所示：

    If you get this message, copy the command that the message provides and run it as shown here:

    git push --set-upstream origin working-branch

你在本地計算機上的 working-branch 分支中所做的更改已儲存在 github.com 上。你對文件的更改現在已提交併推送。

The changes that you made in the working-branch branch on your local computer have been saved on github.com. Your changes to the documentation are now committed and pushed.

測試你的文件link

Test your documentationlink

更新文件以解決你選擇的問題後，你就可以測試文件了。測試文件包括：

After you update the documentation to fix the issue that you picked, you are ready to test the documentation. Testing documentation consists of:

  • 文件 linting

    Documentation linting

    每次你開啟並儲存文件主題時，文件 linter 都會檢查常見的錯誤。有關文件 linting 的更多資訊，請參閱解析文件 linter 訊息。

    Each time you open and save a documentation topic, the documentation linter checks for common errors. For more information about documentation linting, see Resolving documentation linter messages.

  • 手動稽核

    Manual review

    當你的文件更新完成後，請讓另一個人檢視你的更改。如果你更新了技術內容，請讓該主題的主題專家檢視你的更新。

    When your documentation update is complete, have another person review your changes. If you have updated technical content, have a subject matter expert on the topic review your update, as well.

  • 自動測試

    Automated testing

    在你開啟 Pull Request 後，Angular 文件會自動測試。它必須透過此測試，然後才能合併 Pull Request。有關自動文件測試的更多資訊，請參閱測試文件更新。

    The Angular documentation is tested automatically after you open a pull request. It must pass this testing before the pull request can be merged. For more information about automated documentation testing, see Testing a documentation update.

最後複查時間：10/12/2022
